definitions.definition: the day of the week after Monday and before Wednesday
definitions.labels: (informal or North American English)(especially North American English)(British English)(British English)

examples.text: We'll discuss this at Tuesday's meeting.
We'll meet on Tuesday *(= next Tuesday)*.
We met on Tuesday *(= last Tuesday)*.
The museum is closed on Tuesdays *(= every Tuesday)*.
He was born on a Tuesday.
I always do yoga on a Tuesday *(= every Tuesday)*.
I went to Paris on Thursday, and came back the following Tuesday.
‘When did the accident happen?’ ‘It was the Tuesday *(= the Tuesday of the week we are talking about)*.’
Come back Tuesday week *(= a week after next Tuesday)*.

wordOrigin: Originally translated from the Latin for ‘day of Mars’ dies Marti and named after the Germanic god Tiw.
